meta_description.title: Doom II - The Doom Wiki at DoomWiki.org
meta_description.text: Doom II: Hell on Earth is the first sequel to Doom, released by id Software on September 30, 1994, followed by the official release party on October 10.

knowledge_panel.description: doom ii, also known as doom ii: hell on earth, is a first-person shooter game by id software. it was released for ms-dos computers in 1994 and macintosh computers in 1995. unlike the original doom, which was initially only available through shareware and mail order, doom ii was sold in stores. wikipedia
